Filter out cadence delivery options from edit address page
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Description*

When user is editing their delivery address we run validation on their delivery option and if its no longer valid for the new address then we update it to a new delivery option, when we change their delivery option we currently filter the delivery options based on cadence, E.g. if it‚Äôs a plan that should have a 4 week cadence, we filter the options to only return anything with {{*-4WEEKLY}}. As on of the first steps in deprecating the cadence delivery options, we want to filter out all cadence delivery options that have cadence in them (anything with {{WEEKLY}} at the end). This should be behind a feature flag for now.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria* *_(focus on the what, not the how)_*

* If feature flag is on: 
** If user‚Äôs current delivery option is no longer valid, it‚Äôs updated to a valid +*non-cadence*+ delivery option
** If user‚Äôs delivery option is still valid but is a cadence delivery option, it remains unchanged
* If feature flag is off (BAU)
* Should be reflected in both settings - edit address and reactivation - edit address.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#fffae6}
*Developer Information* 

* This is a good place to start from [https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/whitelabel/modules/whitelabel-web/packages/pages/settings/src/components/EditDeliveryAddress/hooks/multi-pet/useHandleSaveAddress.ts|https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/whitelabel/modules/whitelabel-web/packages/pages/settings/src/components/EditDeliveryAddress/hooks/multi-pet/useHandleSaveAddress.ts] 
* Feature gate: [https://console.statsig.com/VNhnT1dlnFGbNlAloFMfp/gates/tpt_deprecate_cadence_delivery_options|https://console.statsig.com/VNhnT1dlnFGbNlAloFMfp/gates/tpt_deprecate_cadence_delivery_options|smart-link] 
* [https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/whitelabel/modules/whitelabel-web/packages/libraries/services/delivery-dates-options/utils/filterDeliveryOptions.ts#L13|https:

links.summary: Filter out cadence delivery options from delivery window page

Revamp the Signup Page
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Customer Problem:*

Currently, over 24% customers drop off on the sign up page as customers are not motivated enough or see the benefit of the product to create an account with TPT.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Solution:*

On the top of the sign up page, we will show a banner that will build customer trust with the benefits of the products and increase there intent to sign up and order their first box with TPT.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Success Metric:*

* Increase in registration page conversions
* Gross CVR improvement
* No decline in retention


{panel}

*Requirements (Design WIP):*

When customer reaches the sign up page

# Show CTA: ‚ÄúEnter your email‚Äù
# Show a static banner as in the designs attached

After customer enter email and clicks continue:

# Show CTA: ‚ÄúEnter your password‚Äù (for new customers)
## If customer already has an account with TPT
### Show CTA on top ‚ÄúWelcome back‚Äù with subheading ‚ÄúLogin to your Pets Table account‚Äù
# Persist the banner on the screen where customer has to enter a password.

*Figma*: [https://www.figma.com/design/jNdT9FMbXNpxNukrSCwfQ0/-SBD-2599--Sign-up-page-revamp?node-id=8205-7983&t=mMD4NL4lJwdOZqlA-0|https://www.figma.com/design/jNdT9FMbXNpxNukrSCwfQ0/-SBD-2599--Sign-up-page-revamp?node-id=8205-7983&t=mMD4NL4lJwdOZqlA-0|smart-link] 

!Screenshot 2026-01-15 at 14.07.46.png|width=354,alt="Screenshot 2026-01-15 at 14.07.46.png"!

issues.summary: Enable Passwordless Sign up & Login for TPT
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Customer Problem:*

Customers currently need to add a password on the sign up page, which is not necessary for them to place the first order with TPT.¬†
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Solution:*

Similar to HelloFresh, we will remove the need for customers to add a password on the sign up page by adding a one click ‚ÄúPasswordless‚Äù sign up option. In HelloFresh, reducing friction by adding passwordless ([+statsig+|https://console.statsig.com/VNhnT1dlnFGbNlAloFMfp/experiments/global_acquisition_passwordless_registration/results]) sign ups improved conversion by 0.8%. We will also enable the passwordless login options to allow customers with or without password to login on the customer dashboard easily


{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Success Metric:*

* Increase in registration page conversions
* Gross CVR improvement
* No decline in retention


{panel}

*Requirements (Design WIP):*

*Case 1: When Customer doesn't have an account with us*

[Figma Prototype|https://www.figma.com/proto/jNdT9FMbXNpxNukrSCwfQ0/-SBD-2599--Sign-up-page-revamp?page-id=8075%3A10415&node-id=8075-14565&viewport=-6451%2C-4678%2C0.31&t=nFtJoUK4tdzWONqo-1&scaling=scale-down&content-scaling=fixed&starting-point-node-id=8075%3A16045&show-proto-sidebar=1]

As a customer when I come to the sign up page in the funnel, show me the option to proceed without filling a password.¬†

The customer will see the email field filled up, with two button with the CTA below:

* Continue without password
* Set password

Below are the expected customer experience, when customer clicks on CTAs on this page:

# If the customer clicks on the email address, take them to the page where they can enter email only (this is the current experience)
# If the customer clicks on ‚ÄúContinue without password‚Äù:

* Create a new customer account and¬†
* Navigate¬†them to the address page (Checkout)

# If the customer enters a password & clicks on ‚ÄúContinue‚Äù:¬†
#* Navigate the customer to Address page (checkout)

issues.summary: Implement migration CLI for active GQ customers to NL
[Payments Token Service][draft] Add CLI to copy payments token from old customer to a new
issues.description:
Service: {{Payments Token Service}}

Requirements:

* Copy payments token from old customer to new
* Publish a payment verification event

Input: {{GQ Customer ID}}, {{GQ Customer UUIS}}, {{NL Customer ID}}, {{NL Customer UUID}}, {{NL Customer Plan ID}}, {{NL Subscription ID}}

Output: 

* Customer token is copied into a new record for the new customer, same token is also inserted into NL BOB DB.
* The payment verification event published successfully to mark plan eligible and subscription activated.
issues.parent_summary: Implement migration CLI for active GQ customers to NL
